maml:description.maml:para: Discovers a VVX device.
Discovers a VVX device.

maml:Description.maml:para: Device to discover.
Port to use for remote device connection. Default is 5060.
Time in ms to wait for responses. Defaults to 350ms
Local IP address to use for connection to device. Defaults to an autodiscovered IP of the local system.
Local port to use for connection to device. Defaults to a random unused high port.
Device to discover.
Port to use for remote device connection. Default is 5060.
Time in ms to wait for responses. Defaults to 350ms
Local IP address to use for connection to device. Defaults to an autodiscovered IP of the local system.
Local port to use for connection to device. Defaults to a random unused high port.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: Find-VVXDevice -Device '192.168.1.100'

dev:remarks.maml:para: Checks to see if the device at 192.168.1.100 is a VVX device.

maml:Description.maml:para: Device to send command for processing.
Protocol to use. Must be HTTP or HTTPS. Default is HTTP.
Port to use. Default is 80.
Number of times to retry if unsuccessful. Default is 3 times.
Ignore any certificate warnings

maml:description.maml:para: Returns a screenshot of the vvx device screen.
Returns a screenshot of the vvx device screen.

maml:Description.maml:para: Device to send command for processing.
Which screen to capture. Can be 'mainScreen','em/1','em/2', or 'em/3'. Defaults to mainScreen.
File name to save screenshot to.
Protocol to use. Must be HTTP or HTTPS. Default is HTTP.
Port to use. Default is 80.
Number of times to retry if unsuccessful. Default is 3 times.
Ignore any certificate warnings
User ID and password for the device
Do not display progress indicators
Device to send command for processing.
Which screen to capture. Can be 'mainScreen','em/1','em/2', or 'em/3'. Defaults to mainScreen.
Return results as a stream instead of saving to a file.
Protocol to use. Must be HTTP or HTTPS. Default is HTTP.
Port to use. Default is 80.
Number of times to retry if unsuccessful. Default is 3 times.
Ignore any certificate warnings
User ID and password for the device
Device to send command for processing.
Which screen to capture. Can be 'mainScreen','em/1','em/2', or 'em/3'. Defaults to mainScreen.
File name to save screenshot to.
Return results as a stream instead of saving to a file.
Protocol to use. Must be HTTP or HTTPS. Default is HTTP.
Port to use. Default is 80.
Number of times to retry if unsuccessful. Default is 3 times.
Ignore any certificate warnings
User ID and password for the device
Do not display progress indicators

maml:alert.maml:para: For this function to work the user must manually configure Settings -> Basic -> Preferences -> Screen Capture -> Enabled
You can view all screens in your browser by directly going to http<s>:\\<device>:<port>\captureScreen as well.

maml:description.maml:para: Sends a REST command to a VVX device.
Sends a REST command to a VVX device.

maml:Description.maml:para: Device to send command for processing.
Protocol to use. Must be HTTP or HTTPS. Default is HTTP.
RESTful command to send.
Port to use. Default is 80.
Base REST uri path. Defaults to api/v1
REST method to send. Can be Head, Get, Put, Patch, Post, or Delete. Default is Get.
The body of the REST request
Number of times to retry if unsuccessful. Default is 3 times.
Amount of time to allow for the request to process (in ms). Defaults to 300 ms.
Ignore any certificate warnings
User ID and password for the device
A full web url to parse
REST method to send. Can be Head, Get, Put, Patch, Post, or Delete. Default is Get.
The body of the REST request
Number of times to retry if unsuccessful. Default is 3 times.
Amount of time to allow for the request to process (in ms). Defaults to 300 ms.
Ignore any certificate warnings
User ID and password for the device
Device to send command for processing.
Protocol to use. Must be HTTP or HTTPS. Default is HTTP.
Port to use. Default is 80.
RESTful command to send.
Base REST uri path. Defaults to api/v1
A full web url to parse
REST method to send. Can be Head, Get, Put, Patch, Post, or Delete. Default is Get.
The body of the REST request
Number of times to retry if unsuccessful. Default is 3 times.
Amount of time to allow for the request to process (in ms). Defaults to 300 ms.
Ignore any certificate warnings
User ID and password for the device

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: $cred = Get-Credential -UserName 'Polycom' -Message 'Please supply the admin password for the device'

dev:remarks.maml:para: Send-VVXRestCommand -Command 'mgmt/device/info' -Method 'Get' -Credential $cred -Protocol 'https' -Port 443 -Device '10.0.29.20' -IgnoreSSLCertificate Send-VVXRestCommand -Command 'webCallControl/callStatus' -Method 'Get' -Credential $cred -Protocol 'https' -Port 443 -Device '10.0.29.20' -IgnoreSSLCertificate Send-VVXRestCommand -Command 'mgmt/network/info' -Method 'Get' -Credential $cred -Protocol 'https' -Port 443 -Device '10.0.29.20' -IgnoreSSLCertificate Send-VVXRestCommand -Command 'mgmt/lineInfo' -Method 'Get' -Credential $cred -Protocol 'https' -Port 443 -Device '10.0.29.20' -IgnoreSSLCertificate Send-VVXRestCommand -Command 'webCallControl/sipStatus' -Method 'Get' -Credential $cred -Protocol 'https' -Port 443 -Device '10.0.29.20' -IgnoreSSLCertificate Send-VVXRestCommand -Command 'mgmt/network/stats' -Method 'Get' -Credential $cred -Protocol 'https' -Port 443 -Device '10.0.29.20' -IgnoreSSLCertificate

maml:description.maml:para: Sends a SIP signal to a device.
Sends a SIP signal to a device.

maml:Description.maml:para: Device to send to.
Port to use for remote device connection. Default is 5060.
Time in ms to wait for responses. Defaults to 350ms
The SIP notify event to send. Defaults to 'check-sync'.
Local IP address to use for connection to device. Defaults to an autodiscovered IP of the local system.
Local port to use for connection to device. Defaults to a random unused high port.
Device to send to.
Port to use for remote device connection. Default is 5060.
Time in ms to wait for responses. Defaults to 350ms
The SIP notify event to send. Defaults to 'check-sync'.
Local IP address to use for connection to device. Defaults to an autodiscovered IP of the local system.
Local port to use for connection to device. Defaults to a random unused high port.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: Find-VVXDevice -Device 10.0.29.20 | Where {$_.Status -eq 'online'} | Send-VVXSIPNotify

dev:remarks.maml:para: Sends the check-sync sip signal command (event) to 10.0.29.20 if the device is found.
